channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Pipeline Maven Integration Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Pipeline Maven Integration Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-41934|2023-10-24T12:51:43.652Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20maven%20integration%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline Maven Integration Plugin 1330.v18e473854496 and earlier does not properly mask (i.e., replace with asterisks) usernames of credentials specified in custom Maven settings in Pipeline build logs if "Treat username as secret" is checked.
